info.title: Azure AgFoodPlatform RP Service
info.description: APIs documentation for Azure AgFoodPlatform Resource Provider Service.

get.description: Get installed extension details by extension id.

parameters.name: $maxPageSize
parameters.description:
Maximum number of items needed (inclusive).
Minimum = 10, Maximum = 1000, Default value = 50.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: Skip token for getting next set of results.

parameters.name: $maxPageSize
parameters.description:
Maximum number of items needed (inclusive).
Minimum = 10, Maximum = 1000, Default value = 50.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: FarmBeats resource create or update request object.

Maximum number of items needed (inclusive).
Minimum = 10, Maximum = 1000, Default value = 50.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: Skip token for getting next set of results.

get.description: Lists the FarmBeats instances for a resource group.

parameters.name: $maxPageSize
parameters.description:
Maximum number of items needed (inclusive).
Minimum = 10, Maximum = 1000, Default value = 50.

parameters.name: $skipToken

get.description: Get operationResults for a FarmBeats resource.

post.description: Checks the name availability of the resource with requested resource name.

get.description: Lists the available operations of Microsoft.AgFoodPlatform resource provider.

put.description: Approves or Rejects a Private endpoint connection request.

get.description: Get list of Private endpoint connections.
Get list of Private link resources.

eTag.description: The ETag value to implement optimistic concurrency.

ExtensionListResponse.description: Paged response contains list of requested objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: Continuation link (absolute URI) to the next page of results in the list.

UnitSystemsInfo.description: Unit systems info for the data provider.

key.description: UnitSystem key sent as part of ProviderInput.

values.description: List of unit systems supported by this data provider.

DetailedInformation.description: Model to capture detailed information for farmBeatsExtensions.

extensionCategory.description: Category of the extension. e.g. weather/sensor/satellite.

detailedInformation.description:
Detailed information which shows summary of requested data.
Used in descriptive get extension metadata call.
Information for weather category per api included are apisSupported,
customParameters, PlatformParameters and Units supported.

FarmBeatsExtensionListResponse.description: Paged response contains list of requested objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: Continuation link (absolute URI) to the next page of results in the list.

enabled.description: Sensor integration enable state. Allowed values are True, None

PublicNetworkAccess.description: Property to allow or block public traffic for an Azure FarmBeats resource.

FarmBeatsListResponse.description: Paged response contains list of requested objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: Continuation link (absolute URI) to the next page of results in the list.
